title: What is the Madrid tennis schedule?
description: The Mutua Madrid Open continues on Friday, with Casper Ruud set to face Francisco Cerundolo in the semi-finals before Jack Draper faces Lorenzo Musetti.  View Friday’s full order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 02 MAY 2025 Manolo Santana Stadium - start 1:30 PM WTA - Victoria Azarenka / Ashlyn Krueger (USA) vs Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL) Not Before 4:00 PM ATP - [20] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs [14] Casper Ruud (NOR) Not Before 8:00 PM ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) WTA - Sorana Cirstea (ROU) / Anna Kalinskaya vs [3] Su-Wei Hsieh (TPE) / Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) Arantxa Sanchez Stadium - start 1:30 PM ATP - [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs [5] Marcel Granollers (ESP) / Horacio Zeballos (ARG) Not Before 5:00 PM ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Madrid

Semi-finals to be contested Friday

May 01, 2025

Getty Images

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open will be held from 23 April-4 May. By ATP Staff

The Mutua Madrid Open continues on Friday, with Casper Ruud set to face Francisco Cerundolo in the semi-finals before Jack Draper faces Lorenzo Musetti. 

View Friday’s full order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 02 MAY 2025
Manolo Santana Stadium - start 1:30 PM
WTA - Victoria Azarenka / Ashlyn Krueger (USA) vs Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL)

Not Before 4:00 PM
ATP - [20] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs [14] Casper Ruud (NOR)

Not Before 8:00 PM
ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)
WTA - Sorana Cirstea (ROU) / Anna Kalinskaya vs [3] Su-Wei Hsieh (TPE) / Jelena Ostapenko (LAT)

Arantxa Sanchez Stadium - start 1:30 PM
ATP - [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs [5] Marcel Granollers (ESP) / Horacio Zeballos (ARG)

Not Before 5:00 PM
ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA)
